thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Up and Away
Global markets began the week on a high note as investors shrugged off market volatility. Financial and technology shares led a broad rally, lifting the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average to their third consecutive advance. One factor that has helped: a stream of corporate earnings suggesting that U.S. companies are on strong footing. In another sign that investors are diving back into riskier assets, a major commodities index logged its 10th straight session of gains. But the Journalâ€™s James...
